fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Roleplay as Nova at night, smiting a player and attacking them.
- Do some um other stuff at night, making the next time you roleplay as Nova stronger.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleplaying as Nova has a stronger effect for each time you did other stuff before:
> One time: You get Basic defense when using it
> Two times: Powerful attack
> Three times: Balances all visitors (see 3962)
- After roleplaying as Nova, this is reset.
- If you roleplay as Nova at least once, and win the game, and Vik has actually roleplayed as Nova in MR before the end of the game, then the message https://discord.com/channels/970041597590929519/970046125065265202/1102976642248360036 is unpinned from <#970046125065265202>.
